com.frankly.franklysdk.app

Class BaseMessageFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.frankly.franklysdk.app.BaseMessageFragment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageInputFragment, MessageListFragment

    public class BaseMessageFragment
extends Fragment
    Contains the logic that is common between all fragments that make up a room's message list and input field.
